About.Title: EMoMiS Forward phase results
About.Description: Molecular mimicry candidates, where antibodies from other organisms that likely cross-react with the SARS-CoV-2 Spike

Features.Name: TQLPP (resid 22-26)
Features.Description: Molecular mimicry with TPO (PDB ID 1V7M)</br>RMSD = 0.9A (p-val=0.09)</br> DL score = 1.28 (DL p-val = 0.01)

Features.Name: ESEF (resid 154-157)
Features.Description: Molecular mimicry with TNFRSF-5 (PDB ID 6PE8)</br>RMSD = 0.42A (p-val=0.1)</br> DL score = 1.749 (DL p-val = 0.03)

Features.Name: NITN (resid 331-334)
Features.Description: Molecular mimicry with ABCB-1 (PDB ID 6FN1)</br>RMSD = 0.41A (p-val=0.1)</br> DL score = 2.259 (DL p-val = 0.09)

Features.Name: NLVK (resid 532-535)
Features.Description: Molecular mimicry with Dengue virus 1 (PDB ID 6WEQ)</br>RMSD = 0.25A (p-val=0.06)</br> DL score = 2.347 (DL p-val = 0.1)

Features.Name: GDSS (resid 252-255)
Features.Description: Molecular mimicry with αIIbβ3 (PDB ID 4Z7N)</br>RMSD = 0.26A (p-val=0.063)</br> DL score = 1.705 (DL p-val = 0.03)

Features.Name: KHTP (resid 206-209)
Features.Description: Molecular mimicry with HPV-16 (PDB ID 6BT3)</br>RMSD = 0.21A (p-val=0.06)</br> DL score = 1.829 (DL p-val = 0.04)

Features.Name: NITN (resid 331-334)
Features.Description: Molecular mimicry with HIV-1 (PDB ID 1V7M)</br>RMSD = 0.37A (p-val=0.08)</br> DL score = 2.012 (DL p-val = 0.06)

Features.Name: FKEELD (resid 1148-1153)
Features.Description: Molecular mimicry with Coronavirus OC43 (PDB ID 1V7M)</br>RMSD = 0.1A (p-val=0.004)</br> DL score = 2.13 (DL p-val = 0.07)
